articles.author: Daniel Desrochers, Megan Messerly
articles.title: ‘He is completely upset’: Why Trump scrapped an India trade deal - Politico
articles.description: The unraveling of a seemingly positive trade dynamic shows the precarious nature of crafting an economic partnership with a mercurial Trump administration.
articles.content: Instead, Indian goods now face a 50 percent tariff after Trump hit the country with a 25 percent levy on its goods and then followed up with an additional 25 percent to dissuade it from buying Russia… [+4988 chars]
